# HKWheelchairUse.yes

**Case**

The user uses a wheelchair.

## Declaration

```swift
case yes
```

## Constants

- **HKWheelchairUse.notSet**: Either the wheelchair use is not set or the user has not granted your app permission to read that information.
- **HKWheelchairUse.no**: The user does not use a wheelchair.

items.description: Either the wheelchair use is not set or the user has not granted your app permission to read that information.
